document.title: Pellete de liens du 16-06-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Downloading the internet It's quite long... (Tags: animation fun haha )
Essential bookmarks for web-designers and webdevelopers In a nutshell, I uploaded the page somewhere in the middle of April; "Web-Dev-Bookmarks' was weekly updated, new links were added; consequently, the visitors started to lose track on a huge number of links; the page has become packed with numerous references which have made the navigation and the use of bookmarks more complex. So the reason for changing the basic concept of this project was a huge number of suggestions and links, which have overflooded my mailbox recently. (Tags: webdesign css xhtml )
HeroMachine 2.0u on UGO - The Ultimate Fantasy Entertainment Character Generator Creez vous-meme votre super heros (Tags: comics flash fun )
CPAINT CPAINT (Cross-Platform Asynchronous INterface Toolkit) is a true AJAX and JSRS (JavaScript Remote Scripting) implementation that supports both PHP and ASP/VBscript. (Tags: javascript php ajax php.lib javascript.lib )
Generador de SiteMaps para DotClear - Armonia | En definitiva... Generador de SiteMaps para DotClear (Tags: php dotclear google php.lib crawler )
Fedora Core 4 Installation Guide Fedora Core 4 Installation Guide (Tags: linux faq fedora )
Jamendo : Ouvrez grand vos oreilles Decouvrez de la musique sur les reseaux P2P avec jamendo. (Tags: libre musique p2p )
viksoe.dk - GMail Drive shell extension GMail Drive is a Shell Namespace Extension that creates a virtual filesystem around your Google GMail account, allowing you to use GMail as a storage medium. (Tags: gmail windows extension storage xp )
